pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.2: At that time the nun Thullanandā gave the full admission to her disciples, but then, for the next two years, neither guided them nor had them guided.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.4: and they did not know what was allowable and what was not.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.5: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.6: “How can Venerable Thullanandā give the full admission to her disciples, and then neither guide them nor have them guided for two years?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.7: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā does this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.10: “… How can the nun Thullanandā do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.11: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.12: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:1.13.1: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to her disciple, and then, for the next two years, neither guides her nor has her guided, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.1.12: she does not herself guide her—through recitation, through questioning, through instruction, though teaching.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.1.14: she does not ask anyone else.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.1.15: If she thinks, “I’ll neither guide her nor have her guided for two years,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.2.3: if she searches for someone to guide her, but cannot find anyone;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.2.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc68:2.2.8: The eighth training rule is finished.
